select amr.id, amr.record_no as recordNo, amr.ivf, amr.name, amr.phone, amr.age, amr.hospital_id as hospitalId, hh.name as hospitalName from hd_doctors as hd inner join ar_medical_teams as amt on hd.user_id=#{currentUserId} and hd.id=amt.doctor_id inner join ar_medical_records as amr on amr.id = amt.medical_record_id left join hd_hospitals hh on amr.hospital_id = hh.id
where amr.record_no like concat('%', #{blurry},'%') or amr.name like concat('%', #{blurry},'%') or amr.phone like concat('%', #{blurry},'%')
